name: Worm Wars
overview: A very advanced and complex version of Worm\Tron created by James Jacobs of Amigan Software and released starting in 1994, with additional versions released to the present time. The game has support for up to 4 simultaneous players. There are 36 types of creatures, 36 different game objects, 12 bonus levels and a built in level editor to allow you to make your own levels and level sets. Two keyboard players, four joystick players and\or four CD32 gamepad players are supported. It is system friendly, style complaint and screenmode sensitive. It also supports an array of different languages.
